item.description: Algebra Lemma Let \(\alpha\) be a covariant k-tensor on a finite dimensional vector space V. TFAE: \(\alpha\) is alternating \(\alpha(v_1,\ldots,v_k)=0\) whenever the k-tuple \(\alpha\) gives zero whenever two of its arguments are equal
